name: KENDO
description:
Room scale: The game is currently room scale only with a minimum space requirement of 2m front-to-back. If playing with SteamVR, please make sure you have gone through setup in "room scale" mode.

Kendo is a kendo training application designed specifically for VR.

Custom Music Import


  • Train to your own music

Virtual Form Training:


  • Form Training (NPC will assume and execute selected training form for user)

Real time customization of sparring NPC:


  • Adjustable Front Facing Only /360 movement
  • Adjustable Speed
  • Adjustable Behavior (Offensive(Attack/Feint)/ Defensive(Block/Dodge))
  • Adjustable Techniques (Determine the odds of chosen technique being used)

Help:

Q:How do I import and play music in the application?
A: Follow the steps below;
In your Steam Library, right click the application and select "Properties".
Click on the tab "Local Files", and click on "Browse Local Files".
In the newly opened window of the Installation Directory, click on "KENDO_Data".
Place your music files into the folder "StreamingAssets".

Q:How do I enable Front Facing Only if I have not enough room space?
A: You do not have to do anything. By default, the NPC is in Front Facing Mode.
To enable the 360 movement; in the "Settings" select "Position" and adjust the slider value.
Press the "Start" button below the slider to activate it.
360 Movement is recommended for a fuller experience.
Front Facing turns the NPC into a static character mostly waiting for the User to charge towards it.

Q:How do I get better performance?
A: The background NPCs are optional, and you can toggle them off for better performance.
In the main menu, select "Settings" and untoggle "Background NPCs".

Q:How do I solve XYZ bug?
A:Please drop me a message or an email and I will address it as soon as I can.
